page.title: 15CHILDRENS'CLUBS & COLLECTING
page.content: { 27%}of the 137 children surveyed attend organised clubs which include {diving,tennis,athletics,boxing,drama, {football,swimming,cricket,fishing}and {Friday Club. 17%}are members of national organisations-{Cubs,Scouts, {Guides,Brownies,Church Brigade,Brass/ {Marching bands}and the{Salvation Army. { 21%}of children used the{local {community centre}but only{5}went to {Sunday School.}The following is a list of items children collect as a hobby. {STAMPS...19}BADGES...13{TOY CARS.....8 COINS.....6{POSTCARDS.6}TEA CARDS....6 {POSTERS...5}KEYRINGS..5{SOFT TOYS....4 DOLLS.....4{TOBAC'PKT.3}SHELLS.......3 {BEER MATS.2}COMICS....2{STICKERS.....2 KEYS......1{POTTERY...2}SCRAP BKS....1 {T-SHIRTS..1}PHOTO'S...1{BALLS........1 PEN'CASE..1{PEN'TOPS..1}PEN'RUBBER...1 {PEN'SHARPENERS........1 AEROPLANES...1 STAR WARS FIGURES.....1 TRANSFORMERS.1
